I couldn't post earlier because the school's comp lab nearly got struck by 
lightning, and all the computers crashed.

::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/Havoc/Repressor/DevilDuer::

Zardus dives, shots going over his head. He looks down as he sees an 
explosion, his eyes widening as he sees it was Feline blowing up.

"Kill that bot!" he growls into his comm-link, pointing at Grenade as he 
fires two dozen shots at him, reaching into a storage compartment for another 
gun.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike flies up, missiles slamming into the tree behind him. He turns 
away from Sharpedge as he hears Zardus' command, aiming at Grenade and firing 
two dozen shots at him, pulling out another gun, holding it in his other arm 
and aiming it as well.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica dives, getting out of the way of most of the shots, a few hitting 
him, making dents and cracks in his armor.

He looks down at Grenade as he hears Zardus' orders, firing two missiles and 
20 shots down at him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Havoc dives, stray shots passing him as he flies at Grenade on Zardus' 
orders, sending a bomb and a barrauge of rapid laser shots flying at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor flies forward, getting a lock on Grenade. He didn't know why Zardus 
wanted that bot particularly dead, but he didn't really care.

Two missiles fly out at Grenade, along with dozens of machine gun shots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer walks out of the Alliance base, nearly jumping as he hears an 
explosion nearby, along with a hissing sound as something hits the shields. 
He spins halfway around, seeing the shuttle. Taking out his gun, he joggs up 
to it, his scanners searching it for any translife.

He gets closer to the shuttle, looking at it. He wasn't really fond of the 
shuttle display that was beginning to form around the Alliance base, this one 
now there in addition to the one from the Iron Fist.
